class.name: PathRemap
class.brief_description: Singleton containing the list of remapped resources.
class.description: When exporting, the types of some resources may change internally so they are converted to more optimized versions. While it's not usually necessary to access to this directly (path remapping happens automatically when opening a file), it's exported just for information.

method.name: add_remap
method.description: Add a remap from a file to another.

method.name: get_remap
method.description: Return the remapped new path of a file.

method.name: has_remap
method.description: Return true if a file is being remapped.
